changelog: Important: Due to high demand, PegaProx releases will now be weekly due to shortage of our capacity to handle support requests. Please wait patiently.
Added: SDN (Software Defined Networking) Management - view and manage zones, vnets, subnets, controllers, IPAM, and DNS (GitHub Issue #38)
Added: Easy Setup Multipath support for ISCSI
Added: Remove Node from Cluster - runs pvecm delnode with automatic cleanup of stale config on removed node via SSH
Added: Move Node to another Cluster - automated 3-step flow: remove from source, cleanup, force join to target
Added: SSH multipath detection with credential fallbacks for cluster operations
Added: Node IP resolution via vmbr0 bridge interface - more reliable than hostname/DNS lookup in multi-network setups
Added: Support Bundle generation for troubleshooting
Added: API Token Management - create, list, and revoke Bearer tokens for programmatic access (scripts, CI/CD, monitoring)
Fixed: SSE/Taskbar oscillation bug in 'All Clusters' view causing excessive re-renders
Fixed: Node IP resolution now happens BEFORE pvecm delnode to prevent cleanup running on wrong node
Fixed: Taskbar expand icon changed from ChevronUp to ChevronDown (thanks @gyptazy)
Improved: Node removal buttons relocated from maintenance-start dialog to maintenance-completed section (logical flow)
Improved: Offline node check changed from blocker to warning (pvecm delnode runs on remaining online node, not target)
Improved: Force Join checkbox always visible with auto-check when old config detected
Improved: Cleanup scripts use killall -9 for reliable pmxcfs termination
